text:
Hi parents!
We have some events coming up:
October 14this Stock the Pantry for our teachers and faculty. Please remind your classes that this is a great opportunity to have parents send in snacks to keep CHC faculty going throughout the day. Teachers rely on this as a treat and for energy. Pantry items can be sent with students during car line and/or can be dropped off in the main office. ü•´üòãüç¨
October 17thwe need help with Halloween decorations. Calling all designers, deco lovers, and Halloween enthusiasts! If you are available, Lower School will be decorating for Halloween from 3-6pm. Amy will be there to assist as well. Don't forget the LS parade on October 31st! Please check the weekly newsletter for each class's designated parade times. üéÉ
